Notes.Text:
This update for cups fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-10001: Fixed an out-of-bounds read in the ippReadIO function (bsc#1180520).
- CVE-2019-8842: Fixed an out-of-bounds read in an extension field (bsc#1170671).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: A buffer overflow was addressed with improved bounds checking. This issue is fixed in macOS Catalina 10.15.2, Security Update 2019-002 Mojave, and Security Update 2019-007 High Sierra. In certain configurations, a remote attacker may be able to submit arbitrary print jobs.

Vulnerabilities.Description: An input validation issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixed in macOS Big Sur 11.1, Security Update 2020-001 Catalina, Security Update 2020-007 Mojave. A malicious application may be able to read restricted memory.
